hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Lens of Truth#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Ice Arrows#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #Volvagia#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Top

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Upper Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: These hints can be quite useful. This is an exception.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #outside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Magic Meter#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Magic Meter#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Child Climb South Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Granny's Potion Shop#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that Zelda's Lullaby can be used to repair broken signs.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Heart Container# and #Farore's Wind#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Deku Shield# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Lens of Truth#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Deku Stick Capacity#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Ice Arrows#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Goron Tunic# and #Saria's Song#.
